songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Everything around you became suddenly unreal as if it were a dream

[Verse 1]
I'm feeling like I'm on top of the world
[?]
I think 'bout you and the times we had
But you keep [?] too much
I lift you up in my lap
I started touching you on the balcony
I touched you in the party [?]

[Verse 2]
[?] no more
I don't feel like sleeping no more, but I'm tired
Eyes wide the fuck open, I'm strokin'
My ego, but molly keep fuckin' up the peephole
I'm tryin' hard to see you
I'm blind, fuckin' up around these people that I just met
So I'm stuck around my boo, I'm new amongst the crew
But then she turns on me, turns me to a suspect
What's next?

[Hook]
I'm never gettin' fucked up again
Never gettin' fucked up again
Never gettin' fucked up again
It's my last time, my very last time

[Verse 3]
I can't [?]
But your love is [?]
But you're by my side and I need it bad
I'm prayin' for you way too much
I get [?]
You feel so good but you're [?]
I hurt you, girl [?] too much
I feel bad when I'm [?]
Can't describe in my mind [?]
But you leave every time I need some company
But you keep tellin' me we're gettin' married

[Hook]
I'm never gettin' fucked up again
Never gettin' fucked up again
Never gettin' fucked up again
It's my last time, my very last time
songs.title: Never Again
